snippet: Jefrick R. Dean Sr., who has worked for the M.T.A. for 22 years, is one of six city employees who are to be honored on Wednesday with a Sloan Public Service Award.
abstract: Jefrick R. Dean Sr., who has worked for the M.T.A. for 22 years, is one of six city employees who are to be honored on Wednesday with a Sloan Public Service Award.

headline.main: Honored for His Service After Two Decades on a City Bus
